thread.title: Great location and a decent hotel
thread.title_full: Great location and a decent hotel - Review of Ibis London Euston St Pancras, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: dhesford
title: Great location and a decent hotel
text: Get off the train at Euston, drop off your bags and go exploring in London! The point of a city hotel is you need a base and spend hardly any time there; this one does the job. The beds are a little uncomfortable and the lift on the '6' numbered side of the hotel is very noisy, but overall it was very good. We had a small issue and the staff solved the problem quickly and without any issues. I would stay here again.
